cs.LG, cs.NE, cs.AI, cs.CV, cs.SY. 

The paper proposes a new method for training artificial neural networks with brain-like learning mechanisms, which is a topic closely related to machine learning (cs.LG) and neural networks (cs.NE). The paper also mentions the use of discontinuous activation and loss functions, which is a common technique in artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The numerical results involve image data, indicating a possible connection to computer vision (cs.CV). Finally, the paper discusses the improved robustness of the trained networks, which is a topic relevant to control systems (cs.SY).
